column6:
As S.H.I.E.L.D.'s elite "capekilling" unit dispatches a globe-spanning arsenal of bleeding-edge hardware to hunt him down, Iron Man confronts the vicious yet seductive "viral avatar" infecting the armor's processors...while plunging to the sea floor to crash a top-secret mecha "roborave" held aboard a sunken freighter!,2007,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller:Brian Denham | letterer:Dave Lanphear | penciller (cover):Adam Warren
